Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Just Roll It - Premium Sushi Catering Website

Features:
- Multi-step interactive form with 3 steps
- Real-time validation with visual feedback
- WhatsApp integration for direct messaging
- Fully responsive RTL Hebrew design
- Premium business theme with smooth animations
- Contact: +972-54-456-3570

Sections:
- Hero with CTA
- Advantages (4 cards)
- Packages (Mini, Standard, Premium)
- How It Works (3 steps)
- Testimonials (3 reviews)
- Multi-step contact form
- Footer with contact info

Tech Stack:
- HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 5, jQuery
- Font Awesome icons
- Google Fonts (Rubik, Alef)
EOF
)")
